## Validate.toConditionOperator() function

Converts a string to a [ConditionOperator](./ts-res.conditionoperator.md) if it is a valid condition operator.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toConditionOperator(operator: string): Result<ConditionOperator>;
```

the string to convert


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ConditionOperator](./ts-res.conditionoperator.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the converted [ConditionOperator](./ts-res.conditionoperator.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
